text: Mbe vhɨra mani rimgi nzɨri mbigi, mbe mbe guguigiap mbe pheni ndi. Mbe maaŋ mbuav fhura shɨshɨgap Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav buni mpeeiŋ nzuai. Mbe maaŋ mbui, mbe zumgum Fhe Bakɨme za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga suaŋv mbe suanga tugar, mbe guigira simtɨga bakɨme ndigirga.”
